hero.title: Free Online JSON Editor - No Ads
hero.p1: BriJson is a free online JSON editor designed for developers who need a fast, efficient tool with no intrusive advertising. Unlike other JSON viewers cluttered with ads, BriJson offers you a clean and professional experience.

why.title: Why choose our free online JSON editor?
why.li1: 100% Free: All features available at no cost
why.li2: No ads: Work without distractions or annoying banners
why.li3: No tracking: Your privacy matters, we donâ€™t track your data
why.li4: Real-time JSON validator: Detects syntax errors instantly
why.li5: Format and minify JSON: Optimize your files with a single click
why.li7: Interactive editing: Modify values, add and delete properties
why.li8: Integrated search: Find keys and values quickly

features.title: Features of the Online JSON Editor
features.p1: Our free online JSON editor includes all the tools you need to work with JSON files: syntax validation, auto formatting, minification, hierarchical tree view, interactive node editing, content search, file statistics and much more. All of this without ads and completely free.

devtool.title: JSON Tool for Developers
devtool.p1: Perfect for developers, programmers, API designers and anyone working with JSON data. Supports JSON files of any size, with syntax highlighting, automatic first-level expansion, and an intuitive interface that speeds up your workflow.

tip.html: ðŸ’¡ Tip: Use Ctrl/Cmd + V to paste your JSON directly into the editor and start working right away. No signup, no downloads, no ads.
